title: How do I switch users on my pixel to view emails from my other gmail account?
content: I have two gmail accounts and I cannot view my emails in gmail from my second account. It shows that I have added the account, but there is no way switch it that I can see. The help says to swipe down from the home screen and select the user icon but there is none.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
